alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 1:57PM MST until February 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches, with 4 to 8 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Beaverhead County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Severe to extreme conditions are expected for newborn livestock.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
